title: Hi what SEHNSUCHT mean ?
body:
Hello, sorry german forum, i dont speak german at all...

While watching the LCS stream, on the Origen intro, all people in Twitch chat was saying at a moment :  SEHNSUCHT
I think it was at the moment when Neils was on the video,

After looking on google, i still dont understand what does it mean, can you tell me, sorry if its the wrong place, i dont know how the new forum work, thank's

replies.body:
Sehnsucht is a word like "you are missing something"... just way deeper feels :)

Sehnsucht is desire .

Sehr gut erklärt.
Wollte es schon mit meinen Low-Bob Englisch Skills versuchen{{item:3070}}
It was amazing who said that, he´s german.
